unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Police Citations | 2 of 2
question_text: Suppose a local police department decides to track how many minor citations its officers give per month. The mean and standard deviation of the number of citations per month is $84.3$ and $12.6$ , respectively. Suppose each citation has an average fee of $\$115.32$ . Assuming this distribution is approximately normal and citations are independent, what is the probability that the police department earns more than $\$125{,}000$ in revenue from minor citations over the course of the next year ( $12\text{ months}$ )?
